eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: Lee finds Lin YÃ¼hsia and tells her the story of Yumen's changes over the years. Zuo Le and Du Yaoye run into each other at the Sword Forge and find themselves attacked by the Shanhaizhong. The leader of the Shanhaizhong shows her face again.

attributes.content: Uncle Meng? Uncle Meng! Are you in there? I need to talk to you!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: It's Du Yaoye!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Stop knocking, Miss. Don't you see the sign on the door?
attributes.name: Wanderer

attributes.content: They closed at dinnertime. Come back tomorrow.
attributes.name: Wanderer

attributes.content: Hey, are you listening?
attributes.name: Wanderer

attributes.content: Uncle Meng! Are you hiding something from me?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I'm coming in, if you don't answer me!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Another one...
attributes.name: Wanderer

attributes.content: What is it with young people these days and going to the blacksmith's in the middle of the night?
attributes.name: Wanderer

attributes.content: Oh? You're Xingyu Inn innkeeper Zheng's...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Are you the mandarin who came looking for Dad?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: When did you get to Yumen? And why?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm looking for someone.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I'm investigating a case.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The government is investigating the Sword Forge? Did Uncle Meng really do something?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Sounds like there is something suspicious about this place...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm the one asking the questions.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Please do not obstruct the investigation, assuming you have nothing to do with it.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Who's obstructing who here?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: The flash of a sword interrupts Du Yaoye.
The lock and the 'Closed' sign fall to the ground, cut in half. Zuo Le charges into the Sword Forge.
(Meng told me to keep an eye out. Didn't think there would really be someone here looking for trouble...)
attributes.name: Wanderer

attributes.content: (I have to get help.)
attributes.name: Wanderer

attributes.content: What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I'm talking to you!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Youâ
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Is this how you people 'investigate?!'
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Show yourself!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Mr. Lee.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: I saw Waai Fu run off just now. Didn't even respond when I called out to her.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: She just graduated from university. Kids her age tend to act before thinking. I hope you can give her some pointers.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'm in no position to act high and mighty in front of your employees. I was the one who made trouble for her.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: No worries. It's a good experience.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: A few crooks are no match for her anyway.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Was my father asking for your help last night?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: I wouldn't quite call it help... just happened to overhear something when looking for someone. We detectives always hear more than other people.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hopefully, it will be of help to your case.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I would love to hear it. Please, take a seat.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Let me decide where to start...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Just hypothetically, what would happen to Lungmen if Wei Yenwu and your father didn't get along?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: 'We're facing a Catastrophe on the outside and Shanhaizhong insurgents on the inside. The General has no time to see a commoner.'
'I hear he knows the General.'
'We should still pass the word, just in case it's really something important.'
'Go up. The general will see you.'
'He's on the tower.'
The night is deep.
The stairs, however, remain as bright as day, illuminated by Originium spotlights in the walls.
Meng Tieyi walks slowly. The soldier behind does not rush him.
It has been more than a decade since he last climbed the towers of Yumen.
Lord Exorcist, sir.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Cut the formalities. What is it?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I would like to ask permission to leave the city.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I heard about what happened to the Messenger's party. There wasn't much left of it.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: There were a few boys from the Sword Forge in that party. Someone should pour out spirits and bring back a few grains of sand where they died.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Come.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Sir?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Has the lockdown been communicated to the entire city?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: You heard him.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: That's why i came to ask you.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Sir, Yumen is currently moving at a high speed over the barren desert. There's no point in leaving the city right now.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Enough.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Yes, Yumen has gone too far. How will we find our brothers in this sand and wind?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: The dead are already gone. The forward progress of Yumen permits no delay.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: The criminals who killed the Messenger have infiltrated the city. The entire city is on high alert. Catching the criminals is the most important thing we can do for the dead.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: If that's the case, please allow us to join in the hunt for the killer.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: We have many connections in the city. I'm sure we can be of help, especially with so many jianghu wanderers in town lately.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Catching criminals and protecting Yumen is the duty of the soldiers of Yumen.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I am not so incompetent as to need to ask for civilian help.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Is that all?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: You struck out in midair with such force, yet somehow managed to stop the momentum.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: The fowlbeast dives into the river and flies away with the fin, leaving behind only ripples on the water. Your mastery of your kung fu has reached new heights.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: May I ask you to demonstrate one more time?
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Only if you can get that frightened sand beast to come out again.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: That's beyond my ability.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: A move is simply the abstract compilation of human reaction, something that is not and cannot be fixed. People don't react in fixed ways. Kung fu is all about improvisation.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Do not let yourself be bound by form and moves when you record the martial arts under Heaven.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The form is the shell, while the concept is the spirit. The Grandmaster taught me that long ago.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Knowing and understanding are different matters.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You should learn to be flexible.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The Millenion is assembling the troops.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: A full hundred-man regiment. That's big...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The men are assembled, sir.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Gear check, then we go to the South Side Sword Forge.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Miss Qiu, Record Keeper.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: Have you picked up the Shanhaizhong's trail?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Monitor Censor Taihe was injured near the Sword Forge. Lord Zuo Le has ordered a search of the place.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: Has the Lord Exorcist been informed?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The General is stationed at the outer tower. He authorized Zuo Le to command his personal troops for three days.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: Is there direct evidence that the Sword Forge was involved?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The details are unclear.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: Where is Zuo Le?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: He went over first.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: He is very anxious about Monitor Censor Taihe's injury.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: Some Sword Forge! Just a hideout for gangs.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: He's not here.
attributes.name: Ominous Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: So Meng had dealings with the Candleholder. I knew he couldn't be trusted.
attributes.name: Ominous Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: He still has the Catastrophe data. Find him.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: After dispatching these two kids.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Who are you? Where's Uncle Meng? Did you kill him, or are you working with him?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Where are the Qis?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Not in a talking mood?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Then we can do this the hard way...
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: A sword flashes past Du Yaoye as Zuo Le steps forward.
He swings his sword without a word, his brow furrowed.
This is the second time that Du Yaoye has been interrupted today.
Son of aâ
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.text: The old smith told me to stay in the house while I recover from my injuries.
Someone has intruded into the yard. Things are chaotic. Have the mandarins found me?
Jieyun holds the sword tighter in her arms.
Shifu said the Sword Forge would be easy to find.
There are as many sword forges as there are inns in the nomadic city, but you are always pointed towards the same place if you ask for the Sword Forge without specifying which one.
She said the Sword Forge was not big or impressive, just a few furnaces and an old tree.
But there are always friends coming in and out, drinking, singing, sparring with each other. They come from all walks of life, but they have fought together and went to many places together.
They take turns fueling the fire, sometimes even grabbing the blacksmith's hammer to bang on the metal for a while. The bright fires keep the night away.
Shifu says there is a place like this in every city.
All Shifu talked about in her last days were these things, these people, and this place.

attributes.content: Who's there?!
attributes.name: Ominous Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: This place cannot be allowed to come to harm.
Stop.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: You're making a mess of the yard! Go outside, if you want to fight.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: So they had help hiding here.
attributes.name: Ominous Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: (Tskâ)
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Why does she have the sword?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Boss, the girl's injured!
attributes.name: Ominous Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Kill her first.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: A gust of wind sends sand flying everywhere, obscuring the figures darting across the yard.
The injured girl steps back, pressing on her wound, and leans against the old tree, panting. She does not notice Du Yaoye's approach.
The masked attacker once again disappears into the shadows.
The young Candleholder steps into the middle of the yard, shielding the two girls behind him. A sword has appeared on his belt, tightly attached to a hidden fastener.
My sword!
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: When did it...? The impact just now...
A broken leather strap falls to the ground, made by hunters out of the hide of their prey. The tough, durable leather was perfect for holding a sword.
The sword that has never left her side.
This is the Grandmaster's sword.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Now that I have the sword, I won't pursue this particular matter any further, if you're not working with the Shanhaizhong. The matter of your trespassing into the barracks can wait.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hey...!
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Give it back!
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Who are you? Let me go!
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: You're hurt. Stay put.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I don't care about the sword, but you being here at the Sword Forge means you must know Meng Tieyi.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Tell me, where is he? Did you see two young people from Shangshu in the Sword Forge?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I'll rip your wound open if you don't talk.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Looks like they're not together.
attributes.name: Ominous Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Those outside block the exit. Don't let them get away.
attributes.name: Ominous Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Did you hear me?
attributes.name: Ominous Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Hmph.
The sound is very close. He turns around, startled.
The pain increases as he moves, becoming as clear as the communicator that has been cut in half.
He does not have time to regret.
Qiubai.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I took care of the ones outside.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The same group that attacked you at the market. Shanhaizhong?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Reckless.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Not only have you failed to improve your kung fu...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I can listen to your reproaches later, after we've taken care of these!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: ...Wait.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Her palms have begun to sweat, after just a few movements.
The yard... the heat...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: It's getting hotter.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It's only March, and it's night. How could the temperature be rising?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Could it be the Sword Forge's Originium furnace...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The fire is out.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Boss, we lost a few guys to her.
attributes.name: Angry Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Stop wasting time.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: So you know you're wasting time.
Do the cicadas sing in March?
The air is so oppressively humid, it almost feels like water. This is no morning dew.
Everyone realizes that something is out of the ordinary.
A drop of water falls on Qiubai's face.
Spring comes late in the north. New leaves have yet to appear on the old pagoda tree.
The water droplets formed on a sword blade!
Master.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Where is Meng Tieyi?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Not here.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: We ran into them as we were preparing to leave.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: This sword...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You were the one who attacked Uncle Taihe!
attributes.name: Zuo Le
